Reviews.Title: BAD BUY
Reviews.Author: MISTAKE
Reviews.Content: This was an expensive mistake.  I purchased the program and cameras with the belief if something happened I could get assistance in correcting it.  I have not been able to get any assistance from anyone on this product.  When I load the program, it changes my screen resolution and I can no longer access my tast bar.  This has really been a disapointment.  Amazon required me select at least one start but it is not even that.  Starting to feel like money wasted.

Reviews.Title: Great system, easy to set up
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: I purchased this system to catch some local vandals. Given the price I paid for this system I wasn't expecting much. I was happily surprised with the ease of setup and the quality. The video quality is more than adequate for my needs. Setup was straight-forward and the included instructions were easy enough to follow. I had the whole thing up and running in a couple of hours. Cameras work well both in the day and night. DEFINITELY worth the money as the color vision is great. Highly recommend.
